title: Handselecta: World's First Font Foundry Dedicated to Graffiti-style Typefaces
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20110130215801/http:/www.typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 30.Jan.2006 8.32pm 

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE:

Announcing the long awaited launch of Handselecta: The world's first font  
foundry fully dedicated to graffiti-styled typefaces. Volume One available  
now at [http://www.handselecta.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20110130215801/http:/www.handselecta.com/ "http://www.handselecta.com") with handstyle fonts by some of the  
world's most accomplished practitioners.

Fonts available for purchase by:  
-Joker  
-Mene  
-Mesh One AOK  
-Meskyle  
-Sabe KST

And the roster keeps growing with new fonts in the works by:  
-Ceasr  
-Clark Fly ID  
-Espo  
-Freedom  
-Mike Giant  
-Rust  
-Stab  
-Spark

-SP One  
-Tester

Best,  
Christian Acker

HANDSELECTA | Flip The Script  
 [http://www.handselecta.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20110130215801/http:/www.handselecta.com/ "http://www.handselecta.com")

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

A pdf version of this press release is available for download at:  
 [http://www.handselecta.com/Resources/Handselecta\_press\_Jan06.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20110130215801/http:/www.handselecta.com/Resources/Handselecta_press_Jan06.pdf "http://www.handselecta.com/Resources/Handselecta\_press\_Jan06.pdf")
author: Miss Tiffany
